QuestData.Title: The Son of Karkut
QuestData.Description: The man you seek went far to the east, to a place near the coast called Death's Stand, beyond Unu'pe.$B$BBe careful if you go in search of him, $n. He bore the mark of Karkut... he who watches over the dead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go east to Death's Stand, just beyond Unu'pe.
QuestData.RewardText: Thassarian? Yeah he was here... what of it? We have more pressing problems right now, my friend.
